LONGSWORD_1.name: Longsword
LONGSWORD_1.description: A sturdy longsword, it is slow to swing but devastating when it hits.

DUAL_DAGGER.name: Dagger
DUAL_DAGGER.description: A small dagger, it is quick to attack with and can be used with one hand.

DUAL_CROSSBOW.name: Small Crossbow
DUAL_CROSSBOW.description: A small crossbow which can be fired with one hand, its bolts are designed to penetrate armour.

STAFF_1.name: Wooden Staff
STAFF_1.description: A magical staff, doubles as a walking stick.
